title: What's really going on with flu this winter?
description: We've been told we're facing an unprecedented superflu. Is it?
content:
Flu should always be taken seriously. It is a virus that kills thousands of people every winter and puts intense strain on hospitals.
However, I can't remember a flu season that has played out quite like this. There have been claims it is both a "sup... [5737 chars]

title: Survivors of Epstein’s abuse condemn justice department for only partly releasing files
description: Lawyers for victims say they have been ‘repeatedly denied justice’ while deputy attorney general says more files will be released
content:
Representatives for victims of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein condemned the US Department of Justice on Friday for only partially releasing investigative documents while at least one survivor said she felt “redeemed” by the documents.

title: Richard Moth appointed Roman Catholic archbishop of Westminster
description: Moth, 67, bishop of Arundel and Brighton, becomes leader of 6m Catholics in England and Wales
content:
The new leader of the Roman Catholic church in England and Wales has been named as Bishop Richard Moth.
Moth, 67, was appointed by Pope Leo to replace Cardinal Vincent Nichols as archbishop of Westminster and leader of about 6 million Catholics in En... [2137 chars]

title: Maresca plays dangerous game as confusion reigns after his Chelsea grenade
description: Club remain bemused by head coach creating speculation he has issues with the hierarchy who want to avoid drama at all costs
